message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. What do you think?
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can we meet in the middle at $120?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate! While I'm not comfortable meeting you at $120, I'm willing to consider a compromise. I'm thinking of a price of $135. What do you think?
I'm still really interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $135. Can we meet in the middle at $100?
Hi Bob, I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable selling at $100. I'm willing to make one more offer. I'll meet you at $125. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm getting close to my budget. Can we meet in the middle at $90?
